DOC.brief_summary: Background study : Astaxanthin show powerfull anti-oxidant . Health benefit show animal human . Exercise enhance effect show animal via enhancement fat oxidation . We want examine effect 4 week astaxanthin supplementation fat oxidation cycle performance train cyclist Objective study : To test hypothesis 4 week supplementation astaxanthin improve fat oxidation improve exercise performance train cyclist Study design : Double blind , placebo control study . Study population : Well trained cyclist 18-30 year old Intervention ( applicable ) : astaxanthin ( 20 mg/day ) placebo 4 week Primary study parameters/outcome study : performance time trial 90 min steady state exercise . Secundary study parameters/outcome study ( applicable ) : substrate use plasma glucose plasma lactate plasma free fatty acid plasma astaxanthin Nature extent burden risk associate participation , benefit group relatedness ( applicable ) : The risk involve participate experiment minimal . Astaxanthin show safe . Insertion catheter vein comparable normal blood draw risk small local haematoma .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Age 18 30 year Endurance train ( ≥3 session endurance exercise per week ) VO2 max ≥ 50 ml/kg/min Training history one year ≥3 session endurance exercise per week BMI < 25 kg/m2 Use medication Smoking
